data.title: Sarah Clarke
data.meta_description: Sarah Clarke is an American actress, best known for her role as Nina Myers on 24, and also for her roles as Ren√©e Dwyer, Bella Swan's mother, in the 2008 film Twilight, Erin McGuire on the short-lived TV show Trust Me, and CIA Officer Lena Smith on the USA Network show Covert Affairs. She recently starred as Eleanor Wish in Amazon Studios' police procedural drama Bosch.
